selected_quotes: So democracy's in trouble? Time to experiment with it. Here are three ideas
Universal Basic Income, epistocracy, end of cash: some radical political experiments for a new age of extremes
Change in changing times. Caught between political extremes what ideas should we be considering?
Democracy only in trouble because poor politicians are not applying it properly in the 21st century.
DOWN WITH COMMUNITY WITH CAPITALISM ,Politics! Capitalism wants WAR Class based CIVIL WAR as Revolution it gets !

citation.abstract: The far left and the far right are closer than they'd like to admit. So can some of their better proposals gain ground in 2017?

news.title: Three radical political experiments for a new age of extremes
news.summary: Press-hating Trump supporter yells at journalists at Florida rally (Frank Thorp V) Historian Eric Hobsbawm famously called the 20th century an “age of extremes”, one characterised by polarising ideological battles fought in the name of nationalism.

news.title: EXPERT COMMENT: Three radical political experiments for a new age of extremes
news.summary: Michael Patrick Cullinane, Reader in US History at Northumbria, writes about political extremes for The Conversation.

facebook.title: 3 radical political experiments for a new age of extremes
